mapper.select: SELECT csq.question_customer_company_no questionCustomerCompanyNo , csq.customer_id customerId , csq.company_id companyId , csq.question_customer_company_category questionCustomerCompanyCategory , csq.question_customer_company_title questionCustomerCompanyTitle , csq.question_customer_company_content questionCustomerCompanyContent , csq.createdate questionCreatedate , csa.answer_customer_company_content answerCustomerCompanyContent , csa.createdate answerCreatedate FROM shopping_question_customer_company csq JOIN shopping_answer_customer_company csa ON csq.question_customer_company_no = csa.question_customer_company_no WHERE csq.question_customer_company_no = #{questionCustomerCompanyNo}

SELECT csq.question_customer_company_no questionCustomerCompanyNo , csq.customer_id customerId , csq.company_id companyId , csq.question_customer_company_category questionCustomerCompanyCategory , csq.question_customer_company_title questionCustomerCompanyTitle , csq.createdate createdate , csa.answer_customer_company_content answerCustomerCompanyContent FROM shopping_question_customer_company csq JOIN shopping_answer_customer_company csa ON csq.question_customer_company_no = csa.question_customer_company_no WHERE csq.company_id companyId = #{loginCom.companyId} ORDER BY csq.createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
